title: King of the jungle: Carbon's story

replies.body:
Sorry I'm late.

Carbon, despite my summoner icon, I am and forever will be a fan of Legacy Esports and you will forever be my favourite jungler in my book.

You're the most amazing, passionate player in the Oceanic scene. You've really put a lot of effort into your entire organization and i'm excited that you're now head of the organisation and can focus on building this empire. Hopefully I'll see you on the desk next split.

Sincerely,
your fan.

PS I'll forever cherish the mouse pad you signed for me :3
